headline.main: SMOLENSK FRONT HELD STABILIZED; But Russians Continue Their Counter-Attacks as the German Forces Dig In

lead_paragraph: WITH THE RED ARMY, on the Central Front, Sept. 21 (Delayed) -- The enormous central front, defended by Marshal Semyon Timoshenko's armies, may now be considered stabilized, but although a lull is setting in, counter-attacking Russians continue to advance on some salients.
abstract: USSR forces continue counter-attacks and advances as Germans dig in. Smolensk
